text: Stig Erik Leopold Anderson (25 January 1931 â€“ 12 September 1997), better known as Stikkan Anderson, was a Swedish music manager, lyricist and music publisher. He was the co-founder of Polar Music. He was best known for managing the Swedish pop band ABBA. On 12 September 1997, at the age of 66, Anderson died of a heart attack in Stockholm. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Swedish businesspeople Category:Swedish songwriters Category:ABBA
title: Stig Anderson
